data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Qian, Hongge, Bai, Xiaoshuan, Heiss, Ernst, Liu, Aiping, Cai, Wanzhi (2019): Rotundocoris, a new apterous genus of Carventinae from China (Heteroptera: Aradidae). Zootaxa 4623 (3): 526-534, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4623.3.4|12 occurrences
